name: Sawmill
description: A place where raw materials are processed or crafted; adventurers might secure specialized equipment or investigate hazardous machinery.
atmosphere: The sawmill has a loud, industrious atmosphere with the scent of fresh-cut wood and the constant whine of saws cutting through timber. The air carries the promise of construction materials and the essential nature of wood processing, while the atmosphere crackles with the energy of industrial production and the danger of working with powerful cutting machinery.
